Recommendations: There should be necessary references, both in print and in non-print. Adequate in quantity and quality, which should service the needs of the students and should progressively develop to grow in accordance with the college's/university's development and expansion plans.
The library staff should attend seminars, training, workshops, and conferences to be updated in the current trends, and for professional growth.
Additional library support staff or student assistant may be hired to perform simple and routinary activities in the library.

For the reading centers in various colleges, on-line information system and other IT materials such as CD-ROMs should be provided to promote and facilitate efficient and effective use of the information in all formats.
